data.title: Most Popular Conference Tables
data.meta_description: View all of the conference tables in the Most Popular category. Please make sure to contact us with any questions about our service.
data.text:
Defense / Military Conference Tables

We take great pride in serving as the military, defense, and government clients' preferred supplier. We've finished hundreds of projects across the US, so we are aware of the unique requirements. We are cognizant of the significance of your logo and the demand for functionality. Paul Downs is a great partner to have when you want someone who is committed to supporting you in your goals.

As you browse examples of the custom conference tables we designed for other military organizations, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Premium Conference Tables

Premium grade tables have features that take them beyond ordinary while maintaining a reasonable budget. They come in a huge variety of sizes and shapes and can incorporate logos, advanced A/V technology, and modular capabilities. Some of our favorites can be found below.

As you browse the examples of our affordable premium grade conference tables, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Traditional Conference Tables

If you’re searching for a traditional looking conference table that gives you all the functionality you need, trust Paul Downs. We use only the highest-quality woods, including Cherry, Rosewood, Ebony, Walnut, Maple, and Oak. We can also incorporate glass, steel, stone, and other materials for a more modern look.

As you browse the examples of our traditional conference tables, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Wood Inlay Logos Conference Tables

Make a great first impression on your employees and your clients by incorporating a wood inlay logo into your custom table. We’ve completed hundreds of logo tables and they always look fantastic. You can learn more about logo types here. Our selection below shows some of our favorite logo tables.

Questions? Contact Us for a free consultation. You’ll talk to an experienced designer who will be happy to help you.

Seats 14 – 18 Conference Tables

A table to seat 14 to 18 users normally ranges in length from 16 to 20 feet. We also make many custom tables that are wider, to accommodate more people at each end. Custom conference tables can be made in any shape or size, so we can make sure that your table fits all the people you need and still fits in your space.

As you browse our custom conference tables built to seat 14-18 people, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Most Popular Conference Tables

At Paul Downs, we have had the pleasure of working with great organizations across the United States and even the globe. Every custom conference table we build usually starts with a problem that needs a solution. Over the years we have found there are some commonalities. We have aggregated a collection of our “best selling” tables that solve many of those common questions we are asked daily.

Here you can see a good selection of starting points for designing your new conference table. If you have questions, contact us or give us a call at 1-610-239-0142. Our design team is standing by to help.

Conference Tables

Paul Downs makes custom tables optimized for the function or functions you need. Our decades of experience with thousands of clients have given us the chance to develop specialized solutions for whatever task you need. We have special expertise in unique and impressive tables, tables with logos and branding, modular and reconfigurable tables, and tables with complex audiovisual equipment.

Use the tabs below to sort and see examples of particular types of table. If you have questions, contact us or give us a call at 1-610-239-0142. Our design team is standing by to help.

Boat / Rectangle Conference Tables

Boat shape and rectangular conference tables provide the most seats for a given length and width. We can build your table with any dimensions and incorporate power and data ports for connectivity. Very large tables are our specialty.

As you browse the examples of our boat shaped conference tables, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Exotic Woods Conference Tables

At Paul Downs, we’re proud to offer a variety of amazing woods from around the world that we can use to create the most unique conference tables. From things like Bubinga to Bolivian Rosewood to Curly Anegre and more, we can craft exotic woods conference tables that truly make a statement.

As you browse examples of our custom conference tables made with exotic woods, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Boardroom Conference Tables

Your boardroom is where you bring your team and your important guests. The boardroom table should be an expression of who you are and what you believe. Paul Downs will help you create the perfect setting for your most important gatherings. This portfolio highlights a few of the boardroom conference tables we have built over the years.

As you browse the examples of our custom-made boardroom tables, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Logos / Branding Conference Tables

Make a great first impression on your employees and your clients by incorporating your logo into your custom table. We've completed hundreds of logo tables and they always look fantastic. You can learn more about logo types and how we incorporate them. Our selection below shows some of our favorite logo tables.

Questions? Contact Us for a free consultation. You’ll talk to an experienced designer who will be happy to help you.

Amazing Woods Conference Tables

If you’re looking for conference room tables that feature unique, amazing woods, Paul Downs is perfect for the job. We offer wood varieties such as Curly Anegre, Bolivian Rosewood, Quilted Maple, Bubinga, and more that can make your table stand out.

As you browse examples of our amazing wood conference tables, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Modular Conference Tables

Paul Downs makes custom modular conference tables that are sized to fit your room and provide the flexibility you need. Modular solutions give you the right configuration for every situation. We can even design your tables to combine into unique shapes like a semi-circle, open center, V-shape, U-shape, and more. We also make tables with integrated power and data wiring to make your technological meetings effortless.

As you browse the examples of our modular conference tables, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Cherry Conference Tables

Cherry wood is one of our most popular conference table woods for many reasons: it has an exotic look, is available in several shades of color, and is a strong, dependable species. Our Cherry conference tables are perfect for any style of conference room.

As you browse examples of our custom conference tables made with beautiful cherry wood, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Business & Manufacturing Conference Tables

Choose Paul Downs if you're looking for a conference table for your business.. We only use the best woods, such as Cherry, Rosewood, Ebony, Walnut, Maple, and Oak. For a more modern look, we can incorporate glass, steel, stone, and other materials. Whatever you need, we can bring it to life.

As you browse the examples of our business and manufacturing company conference tables, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Ultra Conference Tables

Every one of our ultra grade custom tables has something special: incredible woods, custom inlays, amazing finishes, unusual shapes, advanced technology, or all of the above. See how Paul Downs can design and build a masterpiece for your conference room.

As you browse the examples of our ultra grade conference tables, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Printed Laminate Logos Conference Tables

Make a great first impression on your employees and your clients by incorporating your printed laminate logo into your custom table. We’ve completed hundreds of logo tables and they always look fantastic. You can learn more about logo types here. Our selection below shows some of our favorite logo tables.

Questions? Contact Us for a free consultation. You’ll talk to an experienced designer who will be happy to help you.

U-Shaped Conference Tables

U-shaped conference tables provide great sight lines and versatile seating options. We can make U shaped tables in a fixed size or reconfigurable for extra flexibility. Large or small, a U-shaped table allows meeting participants to see and be seen. All of our U shaped tables are custom sized to fit the space.

As you browse the examples of our U-shaped conference tables, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Seats 18 – 22 Conference Tables

A table to seat 18 to 22 users normally ranges in length from 20 to 24 feet. We also make many custom tables that are wider to accommodate more people at each end. Custom conference tables can be made in any shape or size, so we can make sure that your table fits all the people you need and still fits in your space.

As you browse our custom conference tables built to seat 18-22 people, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Square Conference Tables

Square conference tables combine the conviviality of round tables with the efficiency of a rectangle. For a given length and width, a square will have about 25% more seating capacity than a round or oval. We make custom square meeting tables with closed or open centers. All square tables should be custom sized to the space.

As you browse the examples of our square conference tables, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Standard Conference Tables

Standard grade tables are designed to keep your costs low. We've made prudent choices about what features to include and leave out while still providing exceptional quality. Get the benefit of custom without breaking the bank! See below for examples to get the creative juices flowing.

As you browse the examples of our standard conference tables, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Conference Tables

Size, material, and complexity drive the cost of custom conference tables. Every table we make is different, in response to our clients' requirements. We've sorted our portfolio into three cost groups: Standard, Premium, and Ultra. These tiers show how budget choices affect table features and overall design.

If you would like help determining your project budget, Contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Logos Conference Tables

Make a great first impression on your employees and your clients by incorporating your logo into your custom conference table. Build team spirit and show your brand to visitors in the room and on video. You can learn more about our logo inlay process or check out the gallery below that shows some of our favorite logo tables.

As you browse the examples of our custom logo conference tables, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Seats 10 – 14 Conference Tables

A table to seat 10 to 14 people normally ranges in length from 12 to 16 feet. We also make many custom tables that are wider, to accommodate more people at each end. Custom conference tables can be made in any shape or size, so we can make sure that your table fits all of the people you need and still fits in your space.

As you browse our custom conference tables built to seat 10-14 people, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Transitional Conference Tables

A transitional style table bridges the gap between classic and contemporary design elements by combining some of its best qualities. Transitional tables could adopt the typical boat-shape with simple bases but in a distinctive wood species, as shown by the table above. They frequently blend the usefulness and regal shapes of contemporary materials. They can therefore be incorporated into practically any design aesthetic.

As you browse examples of some of our custom-designed transitional conference tables, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Other Logos Conference Tables

Make a great first impression on your employees and your clients by incorporating your logo into your custom table. We’ve completed hundreds of logo tables and they always look fantastic. You can learn more about logo types here. Our selection below shows some of our favorite logo tables.

Questions? Contact Us for a free consultation. You’ll talk to an experienced designer who will be happy to help you.

Ebony Conference Tables

If you’re searching for a custom conference table that gives you all the functionality you need as well as beauty that makes a statement, trust Paul Downs. We can design and build the right table for your space and needs. Our tables are proudly made in the USA from the finest materials such as ebony wood.

As you browse examples of our custom conference tables made with beautiful rosewood, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Finance / Insurance Conference Tables

If you work for a financial institution or insurance firm, you know that your clients and executives deserve the best. Allow Paul Downs to create a unique executive conference table or designer's conference table that represents your company.

As you browse the examples of conference tables we have built for insurance and finance companies and organizations in the energy industry, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Law Conference Tables

If you own or work for a law firm, you know that your clients and legal team deserve the best in collaborative space. Allow Paul Downs to create a unique legal conference table that represents you and your clients in the best way possible.

As you browse the examples of conference tables we have built for law firms and other legal organizations, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Open Center Conference Tables

Paul Downs makes open center tables in all sizes and shapes. Open center conference tables are normally used when a lot of people need to be accommodated. They should be custom sized to the space. We can combine open center layout with reconfiguration abilities for extra flexibility.

As you browse the examples of our open center conference tables, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Seats 22 – 26 Conference Tables

A table to seat 22 to 26 users normally ranges in length from 24 to 30 feet. We also make many custom tables that are wider, to accommodate more people at each end. Custom conference tables can be made in any shape or size, so we can make sure that your table fits all the people you need and still fits in your space.

As you browse our custom conference tables built to seat 22-26 people, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Conference Tables

Paul Downs makes custom conference tables in a wide variety of shapes and sizes, many not found in catalogs. We analyze your situation and recommend a table shape that will work for you. Round tables, U shaped tables, V shaped tables, committee tables - use the sort tabs to see examples of each type.

As you browse the examples of our various conference table shapes, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Mahogany Conference Tables

Mahogany has fine, even wood grains, making it the perfect material for furniture. Generally speaking, it is easy to polish and resists wood rot. The gorgeous, rich color of mahogany tends to darken with time and is simple to stain in various tones. Mahogany wood has an opulent and stylish appearance.

As you browse examples of our custom conference tables made with elegant mahogany, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

AV Integration Conference Tables

An AV conference table with integrated power and data accommodates presentations, conference calls, video conferences, and personal technology. We are experts in putting the right equipment in the right place. Our design engineers know how to accommodate any table wiring situation.

As you browse the examples of our conference tables with AV integration, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Colorful Conference Tables

Trust Paul Downs if you're looking for a unique, colorful conference table that provides all of the functionality you require while also making a statement. We can design and construct the ideal table for your space and requirements. We only use high-quality materials such as Cherry, Rosewood, Ebony, Walnut, Maple, and Oak, as well as glass, steel, stone, and other materials. Our tables are proudly made in the United States.

As you browse examples of our colorful conference tables, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Reconfigurable Conference Tables

Paul Downs makes reconfigurable conference tables for multi-purpose rooms. Our modular and reconfigurable tables combine ease of use with elegant, upscale design. We are experts at integrating complex audiovisual equipment without sacrificing flexibility. Custom sizes and shapes ensure that you get the most from your room.

As you browse the examples of our reconfigurable conference tables, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Education Conference Tables

Choose Paul Downs if you're looking for a conference table for your business.. We only use the best woods, such as Cherry, Rosewood, Ebony, Walnut, Maple, and Oak. For a more modern look, we can incorporate glass, steel, stone, and other materials. Whatever you need, we can bring it to life.

As you browse the examples of our business and manufacturing company conference tables, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Keystone Conference Tables

Keystone conference tables are narrow at one end and wide at the other. Keystone tables are great for videoconferencing and can house power/data ports. They foster a collaborative environment and can be customized to fit any room shape.

As you browse the examples of our keystone conference tables, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Seats fewer than 10 Conference Tables

When we make a table to seat 10 or fewer users, we generally incorporate special features that make custom fabrication necessary. There are also round tables in 6', 7', and 8' diameter that are designed to be budget-friendly. Small conference tables are perfect when you're looking for an intimate meeting space or a nice table to complete your office.

As you browse our custom conference tables built to seat less than 10 people, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Maple Conference Tables

When you are looking for a durable conference table, maple is a great choice. Maple is a hard wood that is smooth to the touch with a tighter grain than Oak. Maple is a popular wood choice for tables so you can rest assured it will last for a long time.

As you look through examples of our custom conference tables made of beautiful and durable maple, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Size / # of Users Conference Tables

You probably know how many people you need to seat. We've sorted our web portfolio of custom conference tables by the number of chairs they can accommodate, so that you can see the variety of approaches available to seat a particular number of users. Use the sort tabs to see each group.

As you browse our custom conference tables sorted by the number of available seats, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Modern / Contemporary Conference Tables

Paul Downs is the perfect choice if you're looking for a contemporary conference room table that's both attractive and useful. We create unique conference tables for all uses. We can make any specific shape, size, and design of table you require, whether it be circular, V-shaped, or U-shaped. Our experts deal with the most incredible wood products available, ranging from cherry and oak to mahogany and walnut.

As you browse examples of our contemporary conference tables, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Oak Conference Tables

Oak is one of the hardest woods used in furniture making. You can count on a custom oak conference table from Paul Downs to be incredibly durable and good-looking.

As you look through examples of our beautiful custom oak conference tables, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Videoconference Conference Tables

Paul Downs has made hundreds of video conference tables. The right size and shape allows your whole team to see and be seen. Custom design provides solutions you won’t find in a catalog. We specialize in integrated logos and branding, and special accommodation of complex AV technology.

As you browse the examples of our videoconference tables, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Round / Oval Conference Tables

Round and oval shaped tables are great for collaboration. We specialize in very large round and oval conference tables, with open or closed centers. Our design team will help you find the best size and shape for your room.

As you browse the examples of our oval and round conference tables, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help with a free consultation.

Seats 26 – 30 Conference Tables

A table to seat 26 to 30 users normally ranges in length from 28 to 34 feet. We also make many custom tables that are wider, to accommodate more people at each end. Custom conference tables can be made in any shape or size, so we can make sure that your table fits all the people you need and still fits in your space.

As you browse our custom conference tables built to seat 26-30 people, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Conference Tables

At Paul Downs, our custom conference tables come in a wide variety of sizes, styles, materials, and shapes. From boat-shaped conference tables made with exotic woods to large, open-centered tables that are outfitted with the latest technology for video conferencing. We have the ability to create any style conference table.

As you browse examples of the array of custom styles used on our conference tables, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Architect / Designers Conference Tables

If you’re part of an architecture firm or a design business, you know a plain conference table isn’t enough to impress your clients. Let Paul Downs craft a custom architect conference table or designer’s conference table that speaks for your brand.

As you browse the examples of conference tables we have built for architects and designers, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

White / Gray Conference Tables

We often get requests for modern conference tables that are lighter in color than the traditional look of wood. If you are looking for a white or gray conference table that will stand out in your meeting space, Paul Downs has you covered. Regardless of your needs, we excel in finding solutions that you can be especially proud of. Through stain, paint, and other materials we will bring your vision to life.

As you browse examples of our white, gray, and light colored conference tables, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

V-Shaped Conference Tables

V-shaped conference tables provide great sight lines and versatile seating options. We can make V shaped tables in a fixed size or reconfigurable for extra flexibility. All of our V shaped tables are custom sized to fit the space. We can even make a scissoring table that closes to a standard rectangle table..

As you browse the examples of our V-shaped conference tables, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Rosewood Conference Tables

One of the most incredibly resilient types of wood is rosewood. Rosewood furniture is extremely resistant to water damage of any kind. Any meeting space can be enhanced with the beauty of a rosewood conference table. We love giving our clients exactly the look they desire.

As you browse examples of our custom conference tables made with beautiful rosewood, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Scissoring Conference Tables

Paul Downs makes scissoring boardroom tables that are easily switched between V-shaped for remote meetings and screen viewing, to rectangular for face-to-face interaction. Our scissoring conference tables are custom sized for your room and number of users. We specialize in integrating power and data wiring.

As you browse the examples of our scissoring conference tables, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Unique Conference Tables

A table is something you use, a place where you meet, and it can say a lot about who you are and what you believe in. Every unique conference table created by Paul Downs is handcrafted one at a time. We've completed thousands of projects and continue to believe that the best custom conference tables are made at a bench by a craftsperson.

Browse our library of conference table projects in this gallery. If you have any questions, please contact us or call us at 1-610-239-0142. You'll speak with an experienced designer who will gladly assist you.

Seats 30 – 40 Conference Tables

A table to seat 30 to 40 users normally ranges in length from 32 to 44 feet. These are very large tables. We also make many custom tables that are wider, to accommodate more people at each end. Custom conference tables can be made in any shape or size, so we can make sure that your table fits all the people you need and still fits in your space.

As you browse our large custom conference tables built to seat 30-40 people, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Materials Conference Tables

At Paul Downs, our custom conference tables come in a wide variety of materials that include woods like Cherry, Mahogany, Oak, Rosewood, Maple and more. Aside from wood, we make tables using Formica, stone, and metals like steel, brass, aluminum, and just about anything else you can imagine. We love designing truly unique tables.

As you browse examples of our custom conference table materials, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Industry Conference Tables

Businesses, universities and organizations across the United States have chosen Paul Downs to create their custom conference table. We have even designed and built tables for clients in the British Virgin Islands, Panama, South Korea, and Nigeria. No matter where you are, and what industry you’re in, we’re confident we can produce the perfect conference table for your needs.

As you browse examples of the custom conference tables we designed for clients like you, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Racetrack Conference Tables

At Paul Downs, our custom conference tables come in a wide variety of sizes, styles, materials, and shapes. From round tables made with exotic woods to large, U-shaped tables that can seat 40, we can create the perfect table for your business.

There are more than 140 boardroom and conference tables on this site. Use the sort tabs to see different types of tables that we have created. Questions? CALL US at 1-484-680-7102. You’ll talk to an experienced designer who will be happy to help you.

If you’re searching for a custom conference table that gives you all the functionality you need as well as beauty that makes a statement, trust Paul Downs. We can design and build the right table for your space and needs. We use only the best materials, including Cherry, Rosewood, Ebony, Walnut, Maple, Oak, as well as glass, steel, stone, and other materials. Our tables are proudly made in the USA.

Head / Committee Table Conference Tables

Paul Downs is the leader in council tables, committee tables, head tables, and school board tables - any table designed to display group leaders to an audience. We specialize in custom tables that meet your size, style, and budgetary requirements. We have worked with every kind of organization. You will receive a tailored solution that’s perfect for you.

As you browse the examples of our head tables, committee conference tables, and school board tables, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Walnut Conference Tables

When you are looking for a durable conference table, walnut is a great choice. Known to be long-lasting and able to be stained to match virtually any look you desire, a walnut conference table can be the perfect solution for your meeting space.

As you browse examples of our custom conference tables made with beautiful and sturdy walnut, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Staff Picks Conference Tables

When you have been in business as long as we have, you’re bound to have a few memorable clients. Each custom conference table we make is a true handmade labor of love. Our staff has chosen some of their favorite projects over the years to provide you with a little inspiration for your custom conference table.

As you browse some of our staff’s favorite conference tables, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Local Government Conference Tables

At Paul Downs, our custom conference tables come in a wide variety of sizes, styles, materials, and shapes. From round tables made with exotic woods to large, U-shaped tables that can seat 40, we can create the perfect table for your business.

There are more than 140 boardroom and conference tables on this site. Use the sort tabs to see particular sizes, shapes, and features. Questions? CALL US at 1-484-680-7102. You’ll talk to an experienced designer who will be happy to help you.

If you’re searching for a custom conference table that gives you all the functionality you need as well as beauty that makes a statement, trust Paul Downs. We can design and build the right table for your space and needs. We use only the best materials, including Cherry, Rosewood, Ebony, Walnut, Maple, Oak, as well as glass, steel, stone, and other materials. Our tables are proudly made in the USA.

Seats 40 or More Conference Tables

A table to seat 40 users or more normally won't be much shorter than 44 feet. This is a very large table. We also make many custom tables that are wider, to accommodate more people at each end. Custom conference tables can be made in any shape or size, so we can make sure that your table fits all the people you need and still fits in your space.

As you browse our custom conference tables built to seat 40 or more people, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Federal Government Conference Tables

If you represent a local, state, or federal government organization and need a conference table, Paul Downs is here for you. We only use high-quality woods like Cherry, Rosewood, Ebony, Walnut, Maple, and Oak. We can incorporate glass, steel, stone, and other materials for a more modern look. Whatever you require, we can make it a reality.

As you browse the examples of conference tables we have built for other government organizations, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Committee Table Conference Tables

At Paul Downs, our custom conference tables come in a wide variety of sizes, styles, materials, and shapes. From round tables made with exotic woods to large, U-shaped tables that can seat 40, we can create the perfect table for your business.

There are more than 140 boardroom and conference tables on this site. Use the sort tabs to see different types of tables that we have created. Questions? CALL US at 1-484-680-7102. You’ll talk to an experienced designer who will be happy to help you.

If you’re searching for a custom council table that gives you all the functionality you need as well as beauty that makes a statement, trust Paul Downs. We can design and build the right table for your space and needs. We use only the best materials, including Cherry, Rosewood, Ebony, Walnut, Maple, Oak, as well as glass, steel, stone, and other materials. Our tables are proudly made in the USA.

Communal Conference Tables

Paul Downs makes communal conference room tables for gathering individuals or small groups together. We’ll help you figure out what size works best in your space. From an intimate table that seats six to tables seating 20 or more, our custom communal meeting tables provide the perfect solution for you.

Most Popular Conference Tables

At Paul Downs, we have had the pleasure of working with great organizations across the United States and even the globe. Every custom conference table we build usually starts with a problem that needs a solution. Over the years we have found there are some commonalities. We have aggregated a collection of our "best selling" tables that solve many of those common questions we are asked daily.

Here you can see a good selection of starting points for designing your new conference table. If you have questions, contact us or give us a call at 1-610-239-0142. Our design team is standing by to help.

Solid Wood Top Conference Tables

The structure and looks of solid wood vary. Because each tree's grain reacts to its own environment, every pile of lumber has a unique appearance. For table tops smaller than 4' x 8' and areas of the table that require a complex design and will experience high wear, solid wood hardwood is the best option. Lumber is also used to create the edges and foundation pieces of tables. Solid wood slabs with a live edge work well for designs that look very natural.

As you browse examples of our solid wood conference tables, don't hesitate to contact us or call 1-610-239-0142 with any questions you may have. Our design team is standing by to help.

Black Conference Tables

Nothing says contemporary elegance like black. Black conference tables are very versatile and can be made out of many materials – including but not limited to ebonized walnut, mahogany, oak, laminate, and even Corian – to best complement a variety of modern conference rooms and boardrooms. Make a statement in your meeting room with a custom black conference table.
